item.title: Potholes causing vibration and noise nuisance, 16th July
item.description:
Unfixed potholes causing our house to shake daily and noise constantly as heavy traffic volume and weight of heavy goods vehicles speed up and down Harp Hill. Located in centre of road outside Cleeve View, Harp Hill.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Harp Hill, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Repair not finished., 16th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Melville Road, Churchdown, Tewkesbury

item.title: Road works traffic lights, 16th July
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 55,57, Station Road, Tewkesbury

item.title: Brickwork on pavement looks to have collapsed, 16th July
item.description:
Outside back door of Charles Clinkard on Montpellier Street 3 bricks in pavement look to have sunk. previously looks as though someone has applied tar to it. Will cause a tripping hazard

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 21, Montpellier Walk, Montpellier, Cheltenham
